posts.post_content:
Posted By: Steve Smith
Looking to sell some of my T206 collections to further my 1914 Cracker Jack craze.  Up for sale are 48 PSA 1 graded T206 cards. Price is now individual @ $21 each shipping is $3 regardless of how many cards are purchased. E-mails get priority and they are first come first serve. Scans can be sent out.
